1.0.name: wordpress/wp-referral-light
1.0.description:
WordPress Referral is a very useful plugin that extends your WordPress website with a very effective referral system.

Boost your website and your business with the only effective WordPress referral plugin on the web. Referral marketing relies on trust and personal relationships to drive sales.

After installation you will have [referral_link] shortcode to display anywhere in your pages or posts the liks for current logged in user. In Users menu you will see two new columns with User ID and Referral ID.

In premium version you'll get:

  • Real-time reporting
  • Unlimited referrals, unlimited referred users
  • Statistical summaries
  • Built-in shortcodes (for downline, referral links and banners)

You can find more details about the premium version at http://markessence.com/blog/demo/wp-referral/
